name: Pizza Party (shreyaa)
description:
Pete owns a pizzeria and needs your help making pizzas for a pizza party!

You have 40 seconds to fulfill as many pizza orders as you can!

How to Play: 

1. Follow the pizza order on the top left part of the screen.*

2.  To select an ingredient, first click the bowl that it is in, then click the locations on the pizza where you want the toppings to be placed. (ex. if you want tomatoes, first click the tomato bowl, then click the five locations on the pizza where you want tomatoes). You must use all the required ingredients in the order available (ex. if they ask for broccoli, use all the broccoli available).

3. Once you have placed all of the required ingredients from the order, the order is complete and a new one will appear.

4. Keep making pizzas until the time is up!

*The order that you place ingredients does not matter. If an order has a repeated ingredient, just use all of the ingredient available.
